Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to prohibiting the renewal of a liquor license during the pendency of any disciplinary proceedings
Summary: Prohibits the renewal of a liquor license during the pendency of any disciplinary proceedings.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to prohibiting the renewal of a liquor license during the pendency of any disciplinary proceedings
